Posts.Content:
I was just wondering I have been getting bruises on my left breast since November..
Is that a sign of breast cancer?
Or should I just stop worrying :)
I have asked my doc about
 this but he did not bother to take a look :(
24 year old female 
Diagnosed with Crohn's disease in December 2008..
Medication - Asacol, Remicade, Entocort, Cipralex and Cerazette. 
My wonderful dogs :) ~ www.poodle.is ~
Posts.Title: bruises on breasts
